attributes.action: use his influence and best efforts to ensure that savers with Keydata who have lost their investments are compensated quickly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Savers who invested in Keydata Secure Income Bonds Issues 1-3 have recently discovered that their assets have been misappropriated. Despite a declaration to this effect by the administrators of Keydata (an FSA-regulated company), no assurance has yet been given by appropriate bodies that investors will be compensated, nor has any clear timetable been published for this process.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
